Plot: After moving into a suburban home, a couple becomes increasingly disturbed by a nightly demonic presence.
Title: Paranormal Activity
Actors: Katie Featherston, Micah Sloat, Mark Fredrichs, Amber Armstrong
tomatoConsensus: Using its low-budget effects and mockumentary method to great result, Paranormal Activity turns a simple haunted house story into 90 minutes of relentless suspense.
